name: The Bound, a playbook for Interstitial: Our Hearts Intertwined
name_original: The Bound, a playbook for Interstitial: Our Hearts Intertwined
description:
"It doesn't matter why you did it. It may have been a good reason. But you signed on the dotted line, and now your soul belongs to Satan or whatever. Might as well do what they say and you just might make it out of this. I mean, probably not. But you can dream, right?"

The Bound is all about the character serving a dark Patron, and their loved ones (potentially) slowly pulling them away from that Patron. It's inspired by Axel from Kingdom Hearts, Darth Vader, Kohle from Cape Lorelei, and Meg from Disney's Hercules.
